metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34324 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: [linux/xen: Possible deadlock in Linux kernel event handling]

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
